roleModal.subtitle: All roles that are currently assigned to your user:

geoRoles.title: Geographical Roles
geoRoles.REGION.WORLD: This role enables a user to query customers from all regions.
geoRoles.REGION.EMEA: This role enables a user to query customers from region Europe.
geoRoles.REGION.AMERICAS: This role enables a user to query customers from region Americas.
geoRoles.REGION.ASIA.PACIFIC: This role enables a user to query customers from region Asia Pacific.
geoRoles.REGION.GREATER.CHINA: This role enables a user to query customers from region Greater China.

sectoralRoles.title: Sectoral Roles
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.ALL: This role enables a user to query customers from all sectors.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.ID: This role enables a user to query Distribution customers.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.OEM: This role enables a user to query OEM/MRO customers.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.IA: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Industrial Automation.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.OR: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Offroad.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.PT: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Power Transmission.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.RM: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Raw Materials.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.RW: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Railway.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.TW: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Two Wheelers.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.WE: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Windenergy.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.XA: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Aerospace.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.AG: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Transmission Application.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.AC: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Chassis/Accessory Drive Application.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.AM: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Automotive Aftermarket.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.AE: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Engine Components.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR.AO: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Automotive Sales.

costRoles.title: Cost Roles
costRoles.COST.GPC: This role enables a user to see GPC and margin information.
costRoles.COST.SQV: This role enables a user to see SQV information.

priceRoles.title: Price Roles
priceRoles.PRICE.MANUAL: This role enables a user to enter a manual price (ZMAN).
